1_17Gq2BtBGSZ18x8sXXDvrBFEx32dq7VwMm.body: Yes, today there are numerous tools and ideas regarding this, there is the possibility of QRHijacking and obtain access through "web", through metasploit obtain connection through a payload and do it with metterpreter obtaining the received SMS to see the notifications to external programs like RATs for android in google.
